data.message: I can't share any memory from past years as I don't have On This Day feature available in my account..This is annoying me most..People who have started using Facebook after me have this feature, but it's a very strange thing that I haven't this feature!!..I want to use this feature as soon as possible...

replies.message: Sorry you are having trouble, Ashfaqur. Please feel free to share your interest in this feature here: http://bit.ly/2gHt8wW. -Joe
I shared my problem by going the link you provided..I also did it in Report a Problem section for this issue 3 times before, but didn't get any help I was seeking for!!...

Facebook good morning, facebook! here is my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site. Looking forward to your response.
